c74object.name: the.jit.movie.ctrl
c74object.digest: Playback jit.movie objects during offline rendering
c74object.description:
Written by Tim Heinze © 2022, www.xenorama.com.
Playback realtime movies offline to support frame-by-frame scrubbing. By default, all moviefiles hosted in the bound objects are loaded into RAM once before rendering. Supported objects are currently jit.movie and jit.movie~.
c74object.discussion: the.jit.renderer~ providing a central context is required in the enviroment.

objarg.name: render-context
objarg.digest: Specify a named render context to bind to.
objarg.description: For convenience, this can be identical to one's world render context name but is to be considered independent. the.jit.renderer~ with a unique context name is required running in parallel for all members of the offline render family to sync and respond to.

attribute.name: loadram
attribute.digest: Load entire movie into RAM before rendering
attribute.description: Load entire movie into RAM before rendering. Unflagging this setting will not load the file into RAM — note, that this may cause framedrops or incorrect recalling of frames.

attribute.name: active
attribute.description:
Set the active flag. There are 4 active states available suitable for different purposes:
0 = ignore this object and pass everything through without recording or recalling
1 = operate normally (default); playback, record and output during rendering
2 = playback and output previously recorded data normally but do not record any new data
3 = playback and record normally but do not output data during rendering
4 = record and output during rendering but never pass incoming data (set automatically when bound to jit.anim.objects)
5 = mute all activity
Note that while recording is disabled, the automatic export upon recording completion (if a name is specified) is also disabled and previous files will not be overwritten.
Furthermore, the active flag is overriden by the solo state of the object

method.name: bang
method.digest: Update established connection to jit.movie objects
method.description: Update established connection to jit.movie objects. So far, only a single movie object is supported. Any connection not established between the dumpout of jit.movie and the rightmost inlet of the.jit.movie.ctrl will be repatched accordingly.

method.name: unloadram
method.digest: Unload movies from RAM for all bound objects
method.description: Unload movies from RAM for all bound objects

method.name: frame
method.description:
Output the corresponding frame at the specified position while not rendering by jit.world.
This method will only work if data has been recorded previously.
This method has not yet been thoroughly tested and is subject to user feedback.

method.name: queue
method.digest: Open the core Queue Manager GUI
method.description: The message queue will open the core Queue Manager GUI in the.jit.renderer~ to specify which instance is recording or rendering in the next step.

example.caption: insert after timing-objects and before matrix/texture domain to record/render realtime data
